name: Void Slugger
description:
Void Slugger is a top-down shooter where you take on the role of a space marine attempting to escape a starship infested with otherworldly abominations. The game is quick to win, but also quick to lose, asking for the player to give multiple attempts before they make it to the end.

And the end is only the beginning. Subsequent playthroughs can be augmented through timers and difficulties, beating each will unlock more files, revealing exactly what happened on this ship. After completing these challenges, a final encounter with the source of all the evil will be unlocked, the fight of a lifetime.

The average playtime ranges to roughly 4 hours, or more for those who find it particularly difficult. In either case, you'll need quick reflexes, the will to persevere in the face of adversity, and an accurate trigger finger if you want to escape this ship.

CONTENT WARNING

Graphic pixel violence ahead

GAMEPLAY WARNING

This game is hard. Be prepared to fail, reset, and try again. There are no checkpoints, but the game is short. Keep your wits about you, space marine.

Playable with Keyboard and Mouse (Controller coming soon)
